title: Stonepeak Raises $14 Billion to Invest in Infrastructure
sub_head: The firm has already committed about 40% of the new capital in 10 deals
body:
Stonepeak Infrastructure Partners has collected $14 billion to invest in assets such as telecommunications towers and warehouses, nearly doubling the amount the firm raised for a predecessor fund dedicated to the strategy.
Stonepeak invests in infrastructure and real assets. Its latest fund, Stonepeak Infrastructure Fund IV LP, exceeded its upper limit and the firmâ€™s reported $10 billion target. New York-based Stonepeak closed its third pool on $7.2 billion in 2018.
Investors...
